name: Mindfuck (Unfinished, prototype)
description:
It is a unfinished game made by Tartaud and me, HamsterOh.

Our idea was to make an puzzle game inspired on Stanley Parable and Their is no game, where the player have to guess every way to get out of a place with an narrator that is sometimes helping or sometimes not. To respect the theme the narrator would be saying "eh their is no way to get out" such as theirisnogame game, so that is a lie their is a way to get out.

BUT, due to unforeseen circumstances we didn't have the time to finish it and do what we expected. We made some scripts such as the narator dialog system that isn't shown here because of this lack of time...

I don't know if i will redo this game idea entierly and properly in the futur. Right now i consider it such as a prototype.

I HAVENT TESTED IT BEFORE UPLOADING IT SO IDC IF IT DOESNT WORK

It just to participate, i was not motivated for this jam after some days of development
